name: E L D R I T C H____D E P T H
name_original: E L D R I T C H____D E P T H
description:
Survive the depths and horros that lurk below.



----------------------------------------------------------

Eldritch Depth is a two-player co-op game about survival against all odds.


H O W 2 P L A Y

Player 1 - the Navigator

A life is in your hands. Good luck.

  • Navigate the other player using your voice (the game registers microphone input to enrich the experience).
  • use the LMB to open doors for the other player.

Player 2 - the Stranded

You are not alone, listen to the navigator

(You should be blindfolded and use a pair of noise-canceling headphones)

  • Use left stick to move forward and backwards.
  • Use right stick to spin your character
  • Listen to the environment, but more importantly, to the navigator.
